value:
$WmMPID_セライナ,ch08_19_Celina_F_Normal,Face|I'd like to take the opportunity
to express my gratitude at your
company, Princess Sharena.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|N-no need to be so formal! Of course
I'm happy to join in and show you all
around Askr as part of your training.$k$p$WmMPID_デュッセル,ch08_21_Dussel_M_Normal,Face|It may be another world, but the
lives of the common folk aren't
so different. Striking, really.$k$p$WmMPID_ナターシャ,ch08_22_Natasha_F_Normal,Face|Their work supports and moves the
entire country. Not only as it is now
but into the future...$k$pProtecting those building a future
for themselves and their children
must surely be why we're here.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Hearing that warms my heart! Now,
shall we head back? Getting home in
one piece is part of the training too!$k$p$WmMPID_ノール,ch08_20_Nord_M_Normal,Face|Hm? What's this now... A villager?
It appears they want our attention.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|Hm... I wonder what the problem
could be. I'll go talk to them.$k$p$Fo1500,0,0,0,255|$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|$Fi1500|Th-this is bad news! Bandits have
crossed the border and are making
a beeline toward nearby villages.$k$p$WmMPID_デュッセル,ch08_21_Dussel_M_Normal,Face|Cowards threaten the innocent
in every world it would seem.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Anger|There are two villages near the
border, a larger town along the river
and a smaller valley community.$k$p$WmMPID_セライナ,ch08_19_Celina_F_Normal,Face|Which is closest to the border?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Anger|The valley. The bandits are sure
to target them first!$k$p$WmMPID_ナターシャ,ch08_22_Natasha_F_Normal,Face|Then there's no time to lose.
Let's move out!$k$p$WmMPID_ノール,ch08_20_Nord_M_Normal,Face|Just a moment, Natasha...$k$pPrincess Sharena, I don't suppose
you have a map of the area I could
examine, do you?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Normal2|I have one right here! Look it over.$k$p$WmMPID_ノール,ch08_20_Nord_M_Normal,Face|Hm...$k$p
